key.name: app-show-recents-on-startup
key.summary: Display screen with recent requests on application startup
key.description: When set to true the recent requests window will always be shown when the application is launched. Either way it can still be launched from the application menu.

key.name: app-show-notifications
key.summary: Display notifications when a request has been sent
key.description: When this setting is enabled GetIt will show a notification everytime a request has been sent or when the timeout has been reached.

key.name: request-timeout
key.description: When a request is taking too long to get a response from the server it can be cancled within the given timeout. When timeout is set to 0 the request will go on forever.

key.name: request-user-agent
key.summary: User agent to send along with each request
key.description: The given user agent will be sent along with each request.
